##### RUN MIXTURES ANALYSIS WITH BKMR  #####
#####                                  #####

```{r}
##### LOAD PACKAGES
library("bkmr")
library("corrplot")
library("ggplot2")
library("beepr")
library("tidyverse")

```

```{r}
##### LOAD DATASET
PFAS <-read_csv("C:/Users/jarva/Desktop/James-Todd Lab/PFASandMidlife/Data/PFAS_DEMO.csv")

```

```{r}
##### TRANSFORMVARIABLES TO NUMERIC FOR BKMR COVARIATE MATRIX
# RELABEL
PFAS$bmi_cat <- ifelse(PFAS$bmi <18.5, 0,
                         ifelse(PFAS$bmi >=18.5 & PFAS$bmi < 25.0, 1, 
                         ifelse(PFAS$bmi >=25.0 & PFAS$bmi < 30.0, 2, 
                         ifelse(PFAS$bmi >=30.0 & PFAS$bmi < 35.0, 3,
                         ifelse(PFAS$bmi >=35.0, 4, 99)))))
PFAS$parity <- ifelse(PFAS$parity == 0, 0,
                          ifelse(PFAS$parity == 1, 1, 2))

# SET CATEGORICAL VARIABLES AS FACTORS
PFAS$edu <- as.factor(PFAS$edu)
PFAS$bmi_cat <- as.factor(PFAS$bmi_cat)
PFAS$smoke <- as.factor(PFAS$smoke)
PFAS$income_cat2 <- as.factor(PFAS$income_cat2)
PFAS$parity <- as.factor(PFAS$parity)
PFAS$race <- as.factor(PFAS$race)

# CENTER AND SCALE CONTINUOUS VARIABLES
PFAS$age_enroll <- scale(PFAS$age_enroll)
PFAS$age_dxa <- scale(PFAS$age_dxa)
PFAS$bmi <- scale(PFAS$bmi)
PFAS$exer <- scale(PFAS$exer)
```


```{r}
##### PREPARE VARIABLES FOR BKMR MODELS #####

###### CREATE MIXTURE OF PFAS
mixture <- as.matrix(cbind(PFAS$PFOS, PFAS$PFOA, PFAS$PFNA, PFAS$PFHxS, 
                               PFAS$Me_PFOSA_AcOH2, PFAS$Et_PFOSA_AcOH))

# LN-TRANSFORM MIXTURE
lnmixture <- apply(mixture, 2, log)     

# SCALE MIXTURE VARIABLES TO THE MEAN
lnmixture_z <- scale(lnmixture)

##### SET THE OUTCOME
VAT <- PFAS$VAT_AREA_mdxa17
SAAT <- PFAS$SAT_AREA_mdxa17
TAAT <- PFAS$TAT_AREA_mdxa17
Weight <- PFAS$WEIGHT_mdxa17
Waist <- PFAS$mom_waist_ma17
Fat <- PFAS$mom_bodyfat_ma17

##### CREAT THE COVARIATE MATRIX
cov <- as.matrix(cbind(PFAS$age_enroll, PFAS$age_dxa, PFAS$exer, PFAS$race,
                           PFAS$bmi_cat, PFAS$edu, PFAS$smoke, PFAS$income_cat2,
                           PFAS$parity))

##### SET THE SEED
set.seed(127)

##### CREATE KNOTS
knots <- fields::cover.design(lnmixture_z, nd = 40)$design


##### CHECK CORRELATION BETWEEN PFAS COMPONENETS
round(cor(lnmixture_z), 2)

```

```{r}
##### BUILD BKMR MODELS 
# VAT
mod.vat <- kmbayes(y=VAT, Z=lnmixture_z, X=cov, iter=25000, family = "gaussian", 
                     verbose=FALSE, varsel=TRUE, knots = knots)
beep(sound=5, expr=NULL)

# SAAT
mod.saat <- kmbayes(y=SAAT, Z=lnmixture_z, X=cov, iter=25000, family = "gaussian", 
                     verbose=FALSE, varsel=TRUE, knots = knots)
beep(sound=5, expr=NULL)

# TAAT
mod.taat <- kmbayes(y=TAAT, Z=lnmixture_z, X=cov, iter=25000, family = "gaussian", 
                     verbose=FALSE, varsel=TRUE, knots = knots)
beep(sound=5, expr=NULL)

# Weight
mod.weight <- kmbayes(y=Weight, Z=lnmixture_z, X=cov, iter=25000, family = "gaussian", 
                     verbose=FALSE, varsel=TRUE, knots = knots)
beep(sound=5, expr=NULL)

# Waist
mod.waist <- kmbayes(y=Waist, Z=lnmixture_z, X=cov, iter=25000, family = "gaussian", 
                     verbose=FALSE, varsel=TRUE, knots = knots)
beep(sound=5, expr=NULL)

# Fat
mod.fat <- kmbayes(y=Fat, Z=lnmixture_z, X=cov, iter=25000, family = "gaussian", 
                     verbose=FALSE, varsel=TRUE, knots = knots)
beep(sound=5, expr=NULL)


```

```{r}
##### VALUES TO KEEP AFTER BURIN/THIN
#
sel <- seq(0,25000,by = 50)

##### ACCESS CONVERGENCE WITH TRACEPLOTS
TracePlot(fit = mod.vat, par = "beta", sel = sel)
TracePlot(fit = mod.saat, par = "beta", sel = sel)
TracePlot(fit = mod.taat, par = "beta", sel = sel)
TracePlot(fit = mod.weight, par = "beta", sel = sel)
TracePlot(fit = mod.waist, par = "beta", sel = sel)
TracePlot(fit = mod.fat, par = "beta", sel = sel)

##### VALUES TO KEEP AFTER BURNING/THIN (ACCORDING TO THE TRACEPLOT FUNCTION ABOVE)
sel_final <- seq(1200, 25000, by = 1)

```

```{r}
##### ESIMATE POSTERIOR INCLUSION PROBABILITIES

summary(mod.vat)
ExtractPIPs(mod.vat, sel = sel_final)

ExtractPIPs(mod.saat, sel = sel_final)

# TAAT

# Waist
```


```{r}
##### DETERMINE RISK ASSOCIATED WITH THE OVERALL MIXTURE
##### SUBSEQUENTLY, ESTIMATE RISK FOR SINGLE PFAS AND INTERACTIONS AMONG PFAS
# SYSTOIC BP, SIZE PARAMETER
risk_overall_m1_a_sys <- OverallRiskSummaries(fit = m1_a_sys, q.fixed = 0.50, sel = sel_m1_a_sys,
                                               method = "approx", qs = seq(0.25, 0.75, by = 0.05))
risks_singvar_m1_a_sys <- SingVarRiskSummaries(fit = m1_a_sys, qs.diff = c(0.25, 0.75),
                                            q.fixed = c(0.25, 0.50, 0.75),sel=sel_m1_a_sys, method = "approx")
risks_overall_interact_m1_a_sys <- SingVarIntSummaries(fit = m1_a_sys, qs.diff = c(0.25, 0.75),
                                       qs.fixed = c(0.25, 0.75),sel=sel_m1_a_sys)

#SYSTOLIC BP, VELOCITY PARAMETER
risk_overall_m2_c_sys <- OverallRiskSummaries(fit = m2_c_sys, q.fixed = 0.50, sel = sel_m2_c_sys, 
                                               method = "approx", qs = seq(0.25, 0.75, by = 0.05))
risks_singvar_m2_c_sys <- SingVarRiskSummaries(fit = m2_c_sys, qs.diff = c(0.25, 0.75),
                                            q.fixed = c(0.25, 0.50, 0.75),sel=sel_m2_c_sys, method = "approx")
risks_overall_interact_m2_c_sys <- SingVarIntSummaries(fit = m2_c_sys, qs.diff = c(0.25, 0.75),
                                       qs.fixed = c(0.25, 0.75),sel=sel_m2_c_sys)



##### PLOT RISK ASSOCIATED WITH THE OVERALL MIXTURE
m1_overall_sys <- ggplot(risk_overall_m1_a_sys, aes(quantile, est, ymin = est - 1.96*sd, ymax = est + 1.96*sd)) +
               geom_hline(yintercept = 00, linetype = "dashed", color = "dark blue") +
               geom_pointrange() +
               scale_y_continuous(name = "Difference in mean SBP (mmHg)")+
               xlab("PFAS quantile") +
               theme_classic()+ theme(
               axis.text.x=element_text(size=11),
               axis.text.y=element_text(size=11),
               axis.title.x=element_text(angle=0, color='black', size=11),
               axis.title.y=element_text(angle=90, color='black', size=11))
m1_overall_sys

# SINGLE VARIABLE EFFECT ESTIMATES
# HOLDING ALL OTHER PFAS AT THE 25TH, 50TH, 75TH PERCENTILES
m1_overall_single <- ggplot(risks_singvar_m1_a_sys, aes(variable, est, ymin = est - 1.96*sd, ymax = est + 1.96*sd,
                                col = q.fixed)) +
  geom_hline(aes(yintercept=0), linetype="dashed", color="gray") +
  geom_pointrange(position = position_dodge(width = 0.75)) + coord_flip() +
  scale_x_discrete(name="PFAS") + scale_y_continuous(name="Difference in mean DBP (mmHg)")
m1_overall_single
```
